website_summaries.verdict: A flavorful, reasonably-priced honey that's a good choice for consumers who prefer a pasteurized option.
pros: Pure clover honey with a classic "honey" flavor and consistency
Generous portion for a decent price point
cons: Some consumers wish that it was organic
A few cracked lids upon arrival have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy raw honey from a local source to use on biscuits and toast so I get the added benefits of helping with allergies, but I like this honey to use for cooking and baking since heating it up doesn't matter,....it's used for a sweetener and for texture. I mainly use this in my bread, dough, and sauce recipes. A favorite is mixing in with barbeque sauce and a good squeeze of Sriracha hot sauce to use on baked chicken or as a dipping sauce. This comes in a good size 32 Oz. bottle, and the price is decent.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great Honey!!!
customer_reviews.text: It can be difficult to find clover honey where I live and I much prefer clover honey over other types. I put it on my cereal in the morning and on cut up pieces of fruit, with just a little bit of whipped cream on top, which I add to most of my meals...a healthy alternative to sugary deserts.
customer_reviews.author: Draquul

customer_reviews.title: Good honey!!
customer_reviews.text: What can be said about this? With all the talk of so many so called honeys at grocery stores being fake..I had to find sone straight from the farm. This fits the bill. I love this larger bottle and the flavor is to die for. Give Ys A try. Its real honey and it tastes amazing..and it's reasonably priced. Believe me when I tell you..I searched hours on Amazon for honey. You will get lost in all the flavors and if you should buy clover honey or wildflower honey. You just have to make a decision. Might as well try Ys.
customer_reviews.author: The Beam Team

customer_reviews.title: Not my Honey
customer_reviews.text: I see all these Great reviews and I don't get it? We opened this up, had it several times, before I finally asked my Honey if this gift of honey I bought him "didn't have an off flavor?" He was so sweet and reluctant to say anything about this gift! It was unanimous! Something was not good?! We hate to waste food but decided we didn't have to finish something we didn't enjoy? Hate to post a negative review but something was off?!
customer_reviews.author: TeTeH

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet, but not very flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was expecting something a lot more authentic and closer to the quality of honey I grew up with. My grandfather has had bees for as long as I can remember producing great honey from wild flowers. This honey is simply very very sweet, but lacking flavor. So if you are seeking a pure sugar replacement this is probably ideal. Otherwise I suggest to try elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: My honey messed up shipping box
customer_reviews.text: My bottle came with the safety seal half sealed to the bottle top and half not sealed to the top of the bottle. And the honey was on the side and bottom of the shipping box. I was extremely disappointed because I really needed this bottle of honey.
customer_reviews.author: Neffendi

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very good honey mellow flavor with the flavor of right from the comb
customer_reviews.author: lynn miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent honey - Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm far from being a connissuer of honey, but I know what I like and this pure clover honey is just fine in my book. I will say, also, that cost was a factor in my purchase. I use this honey in making my honey oat and honey wheat bread as well as my hot process soaps.. As long as the price stays low, I'll continue to purchase it. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product sorry I didn't know about this before now
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product and great vendor
customer_reviews.text: this product tastes great and you gEt more than enough for your money.. this vendor is the best..very customer focused... I had a problem with the first order that was sent to me but this vendor sent me a no charge replacement immediately when they found out about my problem and I received the replacement yesterday and it is perfect !! thank you so much for your speedy resolution...
customer_reviews.author: cindys0417

customer_reviews.title: Still very good, just likely not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on the label indicates it is organic, only the description page. It is still very good, just likely not 100% organic. I mentioned this on the Seller Feedback, and it was immediately flagged for edit, so they obviously know about the discrepancy. Disappointing as it kind of seems they are trying to hide something. Just fix the description. It's a good product, just don't call it something it isn't. Some people have allergies and/or other reasons for purchasing organic.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Best Clover Honey I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this, I considered it was going to be just like all the other bottles of honey I've bought in my life to put in my herbal tea etc. But to my great surprise, this honey has a fantastic taste. It is not an ordinary clover honey! And it's a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Vrinda Krishna

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some regular grade A honey so I took a risk buying online. I usually look for it in hardware stores or feed stores since they usually keep good honey around the counter but I haven't been in a while. This is the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: itkillz

customer_reviews.title: Great for tea, instead of sugar! I won't ever use sugar in tea again!
customer_reviews.text: This is great honey! I have recently started adding it to hot tea instead of sugar, and it tastes SO much better. I don't even add anything else, just the tea and honey and I could drink it all day long. I'm not sure if that's the proper "British" way to make tea, but it certainly tastes fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Clover is very good honey. This is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: John Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a delicious honey! I've usually bought the "little bear" honey from the grocery store. I just want to eat it with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: ... YEARS OF TASTING HONEY I HAVE NOT TASTED A BETTER CLOVE HONEY
customer_reviews.text: IN MY 60 YEARS OF TASTING HONEY I HAVE NOT TASTED A BETTER CLOVE HONEY, VERY SMOOTH RICH TASTE I WILL BUY TWO MORE. I WILL SAY WORTH THE MONEY .
customer_reviews.author: BUSTER  S

customer_reviews.title: Honey for tea safe on my table.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the honey very fine, it's the first bottle I've ever found that doesn't leak or drool, not even on itself. I'll buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: A Mully

customer_reviews.title: Not organic!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT organic. The only place on the (PLASTIC) bottle that uses that word is in the Amazon label on it. I have to suspect Amazon just wanted to get to up the cost. Not buying again. "Fool me once...."
customer_reviews.author: coldplace

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice. I really like the taste. The company is an organic bee farm, however this is not one of their organic honeys. I like the bottle and it pours out easily. Gave four stars do to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For keeps
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting honey. I would recommend. Please keep in mind this is not necessarily organic, as the company's name . I actually like it better than the organic version. My 4yr old loves it in his teas.
customer_reviews.author: Silver shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Honey
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of suppliers and found this one has the best tasting honey, so that is why I always reorder it when I get low.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: A Sweet Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is worth paying some extra to get a high quality product. The taste is amazing! Sent my sister some as well. Will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kate'sPlace

customer_reviews.title: and it was a good value. I'm no
customer_reviews.text: This is a large bottle, and it was a good value. I'm no,expert on,honey, but this one tastes more run of the mill than others I've bought from Amazon and elsewhere. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Honey Sweet Treat
customer_reviews.text: Use one teaspoon every morning in my lemon tea. Blessed to have a Meyers lemon tree in the backyard and just a little good honey makes drinking a cup of hot tea or cold tea such a pleasure and cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight on Taste
customer_reviews.text: Convenient container and a fair price, but the honey seemed bland and lacked the flavor I had gotten used to from some local wildflower honey. I will try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Shirley

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite honey by far
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite honey by far. It has such a nice flavor. The fact that this honey is organic, it is just the icing on the cake for me.
customer_reviews.author: thegratiana

customer_reviews.title: NOT organic honey as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It says this honey is ORGANIC in title and in description but the actual product u get does NOT. That was the reason I bought this. NOT organic honey as advertised. The word organic is not any where on actual bottle! It's good honey but gave a one star for misleading product
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: YS Bee Farms - Clover Honey
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this item in the 32 ounce bottle. Use it mainly on toast and love the sweetness of honey. Well worth the money I paid for it. Recommend it to one and all.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Ohmura

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Really outstanding honey. Very smooth and not thin or runny. Flavor is gentle but pleasant as it should be. Goes fast in our household. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Seafayer

customer_reviews.title: This honey is extra special, my boyfriend even remarked ...
customer_reviews.text: This honey is extra special, my boyfriend even remarked that it's different from 'regular' honey and now prefers it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: This honey is yummy! I use it every morning ...
customer_reviews.text: This honey is yummy! I use it every morning in my hot tea....first time buying this brand, but won't be my last time! Will purchase again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: MADE in USA with USA bees on USA flowers etc.
customer_reviews.text: Accurately described - good value - fast shipping - WONDERFUL TASTE - will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Liked this product
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product, but went real fast. Use honey instead of sugar in all sorts of applications, tea, coffee, cereal etc.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious honey !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting honey I have ever purchased. I will definitely be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty! I will buy this honey as long as it is available. This honey is pasteurized. I contacted the company by email.
customer_reviews.author: sho2

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an excellent price and happy it was on Prime so I got free shipping. I ordered 6 of these and 2 bottles were smashed up but salvageable. I will say on a positive note it is very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tarrin P. Lupo

customer_reviews.title: I feel that this bottle is not a true 32 ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this bottle is not a true 32 oz compared to other 32 oz bottle I have product in, so therefore I will not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It will actually last for a good while and I love supporting local :)

customer_reviews.title: Taste like normal honey
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves honey so I thought I'd buy him some organic thinking it would taste different than normal store bought honey. Neither of us can taste a difference between this honey and the great value brand he already had. Maybe we'll try raw honey next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Came without a lid. Still had the protective seal ...
customer_reviews.text: Came without a lid. Still had the protective seal on it undamaged so I will use it. I just need to find another container for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Honey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this honey for my Mom when her doctor recommended she drink tea with lemon and honey to soothe her throat. I knew raw honey was healthier so I choose this brand. She called to tell me how much she loves the taste. Great product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Candace S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just what you'd expect - ordered this honey as a sweetener on a backpacking trip (we baked granola with it) and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: YS Bee Honey
customer_reviews.text: Love this honey and I get really fast service from the seller.

customer_reviews.title: Clover Honey
customer_reviews.text: This honey came from YS Organic Bee Farm which led me to believe that it is an organic product. It is not. It is better than average clover honey.

customer_reviews.title: The best clover we've found
customer_reviews.text: This is our go-to honey. The best clover we've found anywhere

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this particular brand of quality honey when ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this particular brand of quality honey when used in her morning tea or on top of her hot cereal for breakfasts.

customer_reviews.title: Never Thought Organic Could Taste So Good
customer_reviews.text: The honey was great. The bottle was not sticky either (as honey tends to be). It went great with everything.

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: marketed as "organic". no such indication anywhwere on the bottle I received. Believe it or not, Whole Foods has honey which is labeled "organic" much less expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: absolutely wonderful product that i use with my apple cider vinegar. already losing weight and feeling great...!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Every morning I enjoy a cup of tea and clover honey
customer_reviews.text: Every morning I enjoy a cup of tea and clover honey. Not only was the price good. It was delivered earlier than expected. A great buy. Thanks Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really good honey I buy and give out as gifts.....yes I'm going to buy again

customer_reviews.title: It was good
customer_reviews.text: I take the honey everyday. I am having a cough and I took it. It taste good and smooth the throat. But the cap was broken when it arrived. Luckily the honey did not spill out.

customer_reviews.title: Me & my husband love this honey
customer_reviews.text: Me & my husband love this honey. We use it in our coffee & green tea. This is the best honey ever. We would buy this honey over & over again.....

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Treat
customer_reviews.text: This honey has a rich full flavor. I love it in tea and for baking.

customer_reviews.title: good product, large size, excellent price. great for raw consumption or for cooking. very good.
customer_reviews.text: good product, large size, excellent price. great for raw consumption or for cooking. very good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: not actually organic
customer_reviews.text: I somehow got the impression that all YS honey was organic, I found this in a search for organic honey be aware it is not organic. other than that it is a fine product and a quality honey.

customer_reviews.title: who doesn't like honey
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and long lasting for an affordable price. What else could you want? I would definitely recommend this product. I have to type more words for this review to be published and that's why I'm still typing.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that I was home when it was delivered because ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I was home when it was delivered because the man was going to throw that box on to the porch and it would have broken. But the honey is delicious. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This product is so yummy, it arrived quick and in good condition, would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: The reason I purchased this honey was because it said ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I purchased this honey was because it said ORGANIC in the title. When it arrived it was not organic. I feel the title is misleading, and I would have purchased another brand if I knew this honey was not organic.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Clover honey consumption does a body good
customer_reviews.text: A great tasting honey & good choice for baking or drizzling over a fruit plate with cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay so it's not organic.
customer_reviews.text: It's still really good honey. Clover honey has a certain quality to the sweetness that's kind of hard to describe, but the best way I can think to describe it is that it is what honey tastes like when you're daydreaming about food. This is a good quality clover honey for a good price. Even though it isn't organic.
customer_reviews.author: Renter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the crystalized honey much better, but that's just a matter of preference.
customer_reviews.author: look-n-2-lurn

customer_reviews.title: Delicous!
customer_reviews.text: Its great delicious honey. What can I say. I keep a bottle by my bed for when I wake up at night and my mouth is dry and I have a little nausea. Better for wetting your mouth then water cuz it doesn dry right away and great for when your stomach is a little too empty and you need just a touch of something to settle some of the acid.

customer_reviews.title: ... little too much but I will put it to good use.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little too much but I will put it to good use.

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tasting honeys that I have ever tried ( and I'm pretty old). Excellent in tea!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents they love it they are both really happy with this honey....

customer_reviews.title: Great honey
customer_reviews.text: The honey tastes very good! It was a little high priced considering how much we got! I will stick to buying it at Sams Club from now on!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious honey!
customer_reviews.text: This honey has a wonderful flavor and is a phenomenal price. I am very picky about honey - I find many have a taste that completely ruins my tea. This is wonderful. So happy with it. Stock up!

customer_reviews.title: Cracked lid
customer_reviews.text: The honey is very yummy, but the lid of the honey arrived cracked, with half of it off. Looks like the bubble wrap didn't do its job.

product_meta.title: YS Bee Farms - Clover Honey Pure Premium - 32 oz.
product_meta.description: Enjoy our pure, natural, premium quality, honey as a sweet and wholesome functional food.
